The .log doesn't help much when it comes to find out why it's hanging. Please see the following link on how to produce stack dumps. If the problem happens again, please reopen this bug with some stack dumps.

How big was the file?

http://www.eclipse.org/eclipse/platform-text/development/bug-incomplete.htm

> How big was the file?
4217  bytes

I thought the assert stack trace in the log may have been of interest, however I guess it remains unknown whether that was directly related to the hang.  I'll grab a stack trace from the next hand and submit it.

>4217  bytes
Pretty small. Sad that it's not reproducible. Are you sure that the Text Editor was used and not some other editor linked to XML?
